about_the_game:
Bear the honoured colours of the Ultramarines on your Power Armour and weapons with the Macragge’s Chosen cosmetic DLC, granting you a unique pauldron with a Crux Terminatus design, and exclusive skins for your Chainsword and Bolt Rifle.

All of the Macragge’s Chosen cosmetics can be equipped in Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2’s campaign and multiplayer modes.

content_descriptors.notes:
Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios with characters using their weapons to slash/stab enemies.

Strong Language is used in the dialogue.
